effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 981,621 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 487,703.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.
(4) Set: Smite and Penance increase the damage of your next Mind Blast by 25% or absorb amount of your next Power Word: Shield by 15%, up to 3 times.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 158 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.
